articles.title: Rs 2,000 in co-founder's home, no unaccounted cash, assets at any location: What Income Tax sleuths found... - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The department is also learned to have conducted similar searches on the offices and residences of another B2B unicorn, Zetwerk, within a day of its searches at Infra.Market
articles.content: From March 9 to 12, officials from the income tax department raided offices of Infra.Market, one of India's fastest growing unicorns, and the residences of its Mumbai-based founders Souvik Sengupta a… [+4214 chars]
